UnreferencedRoiToRGBAlgorithm, Voronoi2DAlgorithm, ZProjectorAlgorithm

    public abstract class ACAQSimpleIteratingAlgorithm
extends ACAQAlgorithm
implements ACAQParallelizedAlgorithm
    An ACAQAlgorithm that iterates through each data row. This is a simplified version of ACAQIteratingAlgorithm that assumes that there is only one or zero input slots. An error is thrown if there are more than one input slots.

      • supportsParallelization

        public boolean supportsParallelization()
        Description copied from interface: ACAQParallelizedAlgorithm
        Indicates to the algorithm base implementation if parallelization is supported. Use this function to indicate to the algorithm to conditionally enable/disable parallelization.
        Specified by:
        supportsParallelization in interface ACAQParallelizedAlgorithm
        Returns:
        If the algorithm supports automated parallelization.

      • getParallelizationBatchSize

        public int getParallelizationBatchSize()
        Description copied from interface: ACAQParallelizedAlgorithm
        Returns how many threads the actual algorithm requires. Based on this value, the base algorithm creates batches.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        number of threads used by the workload
